tool_description: Forecasts revenue impact of subscription plan modifications including customer retention, new acquisition rates, and financial projections.

current_monthly_revenue.description: Current monthly revenue from the plan

price_change_percentage.description: Percentage change in pricing (positive for increase, negative for decrease)

estimated_churn_rate.description: Estimated churn rate due to changes (0-1)

acquisition_impact.description: Impact on new customer acquisition rate (-1 to 1)

error_messages: Invalid current_monthly_revenue: Must be a positive number.
Invalid price_change_percentage: Must be a number (can be positive or negative).
Invalid current_subscriber_count: Must be a positive integer.
Invalid estimated_churn_rate: Must be between 0 and 1.
Invalid forecast_months: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 60.
Invalid market_growth_rate: Must be between -1 and 1.
Invalid acquisition_impact: Must be between -1 and 1.
Invalid seasonal_adjustments: Must contain exactly 12 numeric values if provided.
usage: Provide current_monthly_revenue, price_change_percentage, current_subscriber_count, and estimated_churn_rate. Optionally set forecast_months, market_growth_rate, acquisition_impact, and seasonal_adjustments for detailed projections.

projected_monthly_revenues.description: Monthly revenue projections for the forecast period

total_revenue_impact.description: Total revenue impact over the forecast period

break_even_month.description: Month when revenue recovers to pre-change levels (if applicable)

final_subscriber_count.description: Projected subscriber count at end of forecast period
